programme.title: Daddy Day Camp
programme.desc: Chaos reigns when two clueless fathers (Cuba Gooding Jr., Paul Rae) take charge of a dilapidated summer camp and its ill-behaved attendees. Starring Cuba Gooding, Lochlyn Munro, Paul Rae.

programme.title: The War With Grandpa
programme.desc: Forced to give up his room to his grandfather, a scheming boy devises a series of outrageous pranks in an attempt to make him move out. Starring Robert De Niro, Uma Thurman, Rob Riggle.

programme.title: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
programme.desc: As law enforcement tightens their grip, a wiretap on Terry Flenorys phone provides a critical breakthrough; the divide between the brothers grows, eventually splitting BMF into two separate divisions.

programme.title: New Jack City
programme.desc: Two ex-policemen attempt to bring down a powerful drug lords ghetto empire in a drug-ravaged metropolis. Starring Wesley Snipes, Ice-T, Judd Nelson.

programme.title: Sicario: Day of the Soldado
programme.desc: FBI agent Matt Graver calls on operative Alejandro Gillick when Mexican drug cartels start to smuggle terrorists across the U.S. border. The war escalates even further when Alejandro kidnaps a kingpins daughter to deliberately increase the tensions. Starring Benicio del Toro, Josh Brolin, Isabela Merced.

programme.title: Adventures in Public School
programme.desc: Socially awkward Liam has been home-schooled his whole life. When he falls in love with a popular one-legged girl, he abandons his mothers suffocating love and enrolls in a public school, entering a world of sex, drugs and social studies. Starring Judy Greer, Daniel Doheny, Siobhan Williams.

programme.title: Before Sunrise
programme.desc: An American (Ethan Hawke) and a Frenchwoman (Julie Delpy) meet on a train and spend a romantic day and night in Vienna. Starring Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Erni Mangold.

programme.title: Before Sunset
programme.desc: A novelist (Ethan Hawke) and an environmentalist (Julie Delpy) who met on a train nine years earlier reunite in Paris. Starring Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Vernon Dobtcheff.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: While transporting a usually docile Abnormal, Magnuss helicopter crashes, leaving her and Will stranded in the shaft of an abandoned oil rig; they soon find they are not alone in the water.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: While an old friend of Magnus, a pouched abnormal named Jimmy, is handing over a fire elemental to the Sanctuary team, they are attacked by a gang of criminal abnormals from Chicago; the situation presents a lot of mysteries to be solved quickly.

programme.title: Blizzard
programme.desc: A youngster learns about true friendship with the help of a magically gifted reindeer from the North Pole. Starring Brenda Blethyn, Christopher Plummer, Kevin Pollak.

programme.title: Perfect High
programme.desc: A teens (Bella Thorne) life spirals out of control when she starts abusing painkillers and heroin with her new friends (Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla) from school. Starring Bella Thorne, Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A New Jersey teen (Ralph Macchio) moves to California, meets bullies and learns karate from a handyman, Mr. Miyagi (Noriyuki "Pat" Morita). Starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Elisabeth Shue.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: Mr. Miyagi returns to Okinawa with his karate student and meets an old foes challenge to a duel. Starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Martin Kove.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: Mr. Miyagi (Noriyuki "Pat" Morita) and his student (Ralph Macchio) open a bonsai-tree shop, then fight thugs sent by a millionaire toxic-waste dumper. Starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Robyn Lively.

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Mr. Miyagi teaches karate to an angry orphan being bullied at her high school. Starring Hilary Swank, Pat Morita, Michael Ironside.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: American boy Dre Parkers fighting skills are no match for Cheng, the school bully. He finds a friend in Mr. Han, a maintenance man who is also a martial-arts master. Mr. Han teaches Dre kung fu in the hope that Dre will be able to face down Cheng. Starring Jaden Smith, Jackie Chan, Taraji P. Henson.

programme.title: Higher Learning
programme.desc: The harsh realities of identity, sex, politics and racism greet the incoming freshmen of Columbus University. Starring Omar Epps, Kristy Swanson, Michael Rapaport.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Christine assumes total control.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Erica Myles, a finance director at a super PAC, enlists the services of escort Anna in an attempt to gain a secret.

programme.title: Minx
programme.sub-title: The Perils of Being a Wealthy Widow
programme.desc: One year into launching Minx Magazine, Joyce struggles to pick a new publisher she can trust; drowning in debt, Doug scrambles to keep his company afloat; Shelly goes back to the burbs to focus on her family.

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: Crunch Calhoun, a motorcycle daredevil and art thief, agrees to help his brother with one last heist. As Crunch gathers his old team and plans to steal a priceless book, he has no idea his brother has his own hidden agenda. Starring Kurt Russell, Matt Dillon, Jay Baruchel.

programme.title: Diamond Tongues
programme.desc: Edith dreams of being a successful actress, but cannot land any roles. When she cant figure out what she is doing wrong, she starts to mess everything up. Starring Leah Fay Goldstein, Nick Flanagan, Adam Gurfinkel.

programme.title: French Exit
programme.desc: A widowed New York socialite and her aimless son move to Paris after she spends the last of her husbands inheritance. Starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Lucas Hedges, Tracy Letts.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: When rich youngsters begin to disappear after an apparent death and then come back to life, the trail leads Will and Magnus to a drug clinic in Mexico run by Nicola Tesla.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Magnus and the team rescue passengers and crew from a sinking ship, taking them back to Sanctuary for medical treatment.

programme.title: Air Bud: World Pup
programme.desc: The golden retriever helps his young owner (Kevin Zegers) and his coed soccer team to shine while outsmarting a wily dogcatcher. Starring Kevin Zegers, Dale Midkiff, Caitlin Wachs.

programme.title: Kayak to Klemtu
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl readies for a kayak trip along the shores of the Great Bear rainforest with her family to protest oil tanker traffic. Starring Evan Adams, Jared Ager-Foster, Carmel Amit.

programme.title: Eve and the Fire Horse
programme.desc: A 9-year-old Chinese girl (Phoebe Jojo Kut) and her older sister (Hollie Lo) embrace their experiences at a Roman Catholic Sunday school. Starring Phoebe Jojo Kut, Hollie Lo, Vivian Wu.

programme.title: Born to Be Wild
programme.desc: Dedicated teams in Africa and Borneo save the lives of orphaned elephants and orangutans and prepare them for release back into the wild.

programme.title: Miltons Secret
programme.desc: A man (Donald Sutherland) teaches his 11-year-old grandson (William Ainscough) how to cope with bickering parents and the neighborhood bully. Starring Donald Sutherland, Michelle Rodriguez, Mia Kirshner.

programme.title: Gem and Shaz
programme.desc: Two Asian Canadian teenage girls are given one hour at the school dance by their strict immigrant parents and are determined to make the most of it. Starring Jasmine Parmar, Cecilia Lee, Maryam Khalid.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future society, people are divided into factions based on their personalities. After a young woman (Shailene Woodley) learns she is a Divergent and will never fit into any one group, she uncovers a conspiracy to destroy all those like her. Starring Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Ashley Judd.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: As a ruthless battle threatens humanity, Tris and Four journey beyond the wall that encloses Chicago to find a peaceful solution for their embroiled city. Starring Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Jeff Daniels.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
programme.desc: Fugitives Tris (Shailene Woodley) and Four (Theo James) search for allies and answers among the ruins of Chicago while arduously trying to evade Jeanine (Kate Winslet), leader of the Erudites. Starring Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Octavia Spencer.

programme.title: Creed
programme.desc: Long-retired boxer Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) agrees to train Apollo Creeds son (Michael B. Jordan) to become a fighter, even as the former champ battles an opponent deadlier than any he ever faced in the ring. Starring Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone, Tessa Thompson.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Anna delivers a piece of evidence against Novak; Ericas relationship with Anna becomes personal; a financier contacts Erica.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Erica secures her biggest donor yet; Novak searches for revenge; Anna and Ericas relationship intensifies.

programme.title: Minx
programme.sub-title: I Thought the Bed Was Gonna Fly
programme.desc: Bottom Dollar hosts the West Coast premiere of the controversial and illegal adult film "Deep Throat"; Doug tries to dazzle their new publisher, Constance, while Joyce sets out to get a famed writer to contribute a piece for Minx.

programme.title: Heavenly Bodies
programme.desc: Samantha quits her job to open an aerobics studio and competes with a larger clubs lead instructor to become an aerobics instructor on a local fitness television show. Starring Cynthia Dale, Richard Rebiere, Walter George Alton.

programme.title: Lie With Me
programme.desc: A young man (Eric Balfour) and woman (Lauren Lee Smith) enjoy sexual compatibility but have trouble communicating and helping each other with problems. Starring Eric Balfour, Lauren Lee Smith, Don Francks.

programme.title: Passchendaele
programme.desc: Sgt. Dunne (Paul Gross) returns to war to look after a nurses brother. Starring Caroline Dhavernas, Gil Bellows, Paul Gross.

programme.title: Sanctuary

programme.desc: Will begins to experience strange visions that are connected to the Cult of Kali; Magnus has difficulty with finding the solution to their problems.

programme.title: Breakaway
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his traditional Indo-Canadian family expectations and his dreams of playing hockey. Starring Russell Peters, Rob Lowe, Camilla Belle.

programme.desc: During a vacation in Egypt, an unexpected love affair arises between a magazine editor (Patricia Clarkson) and her husbands former colleague (Alexander Siddig). Starring Patricia Clarkson, Alexander Siddig, Elena Anaya.

programme.desc: Bettys Barney (Rick Moranis) helps Wilmas (Elizabeth Perkins) Fred (John Goodman) move up the ladder at Slate and Co. in Stone Age Bedrock. Starring John Goodman, Elizabeth Perkins, Rick Moranis.

Starring Cierra Ramirez, Angelique Rivera, Gregg Sulkin.

programme.title: Creed II
programme.desc: Under guidance from Rocky Balboa, boxing phenom Adonis Johnson prepares for a showdown against the son of Ivan Drago, the former Russian fighter who killed Apollo Creed in the ring. Starring Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone, Tessa Thompson.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Erica gets a suspicious call from a representative of a potential donor; Anna subjugates herself to Ericas sexual desires.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Erica decides to accept the 25 million dollars from the billionaire financier; Anna reveals some big news to Erica.

programme.title: Minx
programme.desc: Six months later, Minx is front and center of the sexual revolution, and Rolling Stone descends on the Bottom Dollar offices to interview the gang.

programme.title: Cosmopolis
programme.desc: A 28-year-old billionaire (Robert Pattinson) senses his empire collapsing around him as he takes a limo ride across Manhattan to get a haircut from his fathers old barber. Starring Robert Pattinson, Juliette Binoche, Sarah Gadon.

programme.title: Bonnie and Clyde
programme.desc: Acclaimed account of the gun-toting bank robbers and the trail of terror they blazed through the Southwest in the 30s. Starring Warren Beatty, Faye Dunaway, Michael J. Pollard.

programme.desc: A brave federal agent poses as a thug to infiltrate psychopathic hoodlum Cody Jarretts gang of thieves. Starring James Cagney, Virginia Mayo, Edmond OBrien.

programme.desc: Two ex-convicts (Robert Blake, Scott Wilson) are tried for the savage killing of a farm family in 1959 Kansas. Starring Robert Blake, Scott Wilson, John Forsythe.

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: A man robs a bank to pay for his lovers operation. It turns into a hostage situation and a media circus. Starring Al Pacino, John Cazale, Charles Durning.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A Harlem mob boss (Moses Gunn) hires a private eye (Richard Roundtree) to find his kidnapped daughter. Starring Richard Roundtree, Moses Gunn, Christopher St. John.

programme.title: The Window
programme.desc: A boy (Bobby Driscoll) sees a murder in his New York tenement, but his parents (Barbara Hale, Arthur Kennedy) do not believe him. Starring Bobby Driscoll, Barbara Hale, Arthur Kennedy.

programme.title: Our Dancing Daughters
programme.desc: A flapper (Joan Crawford) loves a millionaire (Johnny Mack Brown), but he tragically marries someone else. Starring Joan Crawford, Johnny Mack Brown, Dorothy Sebastian.

programme.title: Edward, My Son
programme.desc: A businessmans desire to protect his corrupt sons fortune leads to tragedy in this adaptation of the British play. Starring Spencer Tracy, Deborah Kerr, Ian Hunter.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: Orson Welles tale of an eccentric Indiana family clinging to tradition during a time of rapid change. Starring Joseph Cotten, Tim Holt, Dolores Costello.

programme.title: The Brothers Karamazov
programme.desc: In 19th-century Russia, the murder of a domineering man (Lee J. Cobb) affects his four sons differently. Starring Yul Brynner, Maria Schell, Lee J. Cobb.

programme.title: I Remember Mama
programme.desc: A writer (Barbara Bel Geddes) recalls her Norwegian mother (Irene Dunne) and family in circa-1900 San Francisco. Starring Irene Dunne, Barbara Bel Geddes, Oscar Homolka.

programme.title: I Never Sang for My Father
programme.desc: A middle-aged New York professor (Gene Hackman) loses his mother (Dorothy Stickney) and reaches out to his bitter father (Melvyn Douglas). Starring Melvyn Douglas, Gene Hackman, Dorothy Stickney.

programme.title: Auntie Mame

programme.title: The Childrens Hour
programme.desc: Based on Lillian Hellmans play about the effect of a students malicious lie at an exclusive boarding school. Starring Audrey Hepburn, Shirley MacLaine, James Garner.

programme.title: The Corn Is Green

programme.title: The Happy Road
programme.desc: A U.S. widower (Gene Kelly) and a French divorcee (Barbara Laage) team up to find their respective runaway son and daughter. Starring Gene Kelly, Barbara Laage, Michael Redgrave.

programme.title: Goodbye, Mr. Chips

programme.title: Good News

programme.desc: Realising that someone on board may be working with the hackers, Joe turns his attention to his fellow passengers, while Abby stuns her colleagues by taking the train off the mainline.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Rob leads a daring heist to steal the Sheriffs own bounty for his capture; success could fund their cause but the risks force every outlaw to face the true cost of rebellion.

programme.title: How Not to Hire a Hitman
Missing From Fire Trail Road
programme.desc: A documentary detailing the case of Mary Ellen Johnson-Davis, a Native American woman who disappeared in 2020. Her story exposes how hundreds of indigenous women continue to go missing in the USA, perpetuating trans-generational traumas.

programme.title: Know Her Name
programme.desc: Delving into the legacy of filmmakers and uncovers the mystery of why women, especially from underrepresented communities - like Zora Neale Hurston and Esther Eng were - have been erased through historical amnesia.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: The murder investigation of Michael Rainsford, a 20-year-old young man, benefits from social media evidence, particularly Snapchat, which exposes his murderers actions the night he is killed.

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: The Matchmaker searches for a lady similar to Sebastians mother.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: In 1973, Noreen Kumeta Rudds life is cut tragically short, just 27 days after marrying Donnie Rudd; initially deemed a car accident, this event leads to Donnie collecting a $120,000 life insurance payout.

programme.title: Charmed to Death
programme.desc: Montie Smith is at a Halloween party when he gets pulled on to the dance floor by a sexy brunette. Shaynna Sims is 22 and a perky single Mum who sweeps Montie into a world of drugs, lies and demented jealousy that culminates in an unspeakable horror.

programme.title: Charmed to Death
programme.desc: Special Ed School teacher Tracy Wygant is sticking out her abusive marriage to Chris Chanowitz through thick and thin, until his surprise gift almost ends her life.

programme.title: Picture Her Dead
programme.desc: When aspiring artist Chloe accidentally takes credit for a painting of a murdered woman, she must discover its true origin before the killer sets their sights on her. She finds a history of murdered models, all leading back to the unknown painter. Starring Tess Cline, Allen Williamson, Ali Zahiri.

programme.title: The Nanny Sees All
programme.desc: Grace Andersons new job as a nanny for the mayors family turns into a nightmare when a murder rocks the town and she starts receiving ominous messages. Now, Grace starts to question what deadly secrets are lurking in her hometown. Starring Golden Madison, Julia Borsellino, Lisa Langlois.

programme.title: Home Free
programme.desc: A man recently diagnosed with a fatal brain tumour announces that he is choosing to die on his own terms and is not seeking treatment. Starring Tara Spencer-Nairn, Natalie Brown, Art Hindle.

programme.title: Heartland Homicide
programme.desc: A family man goes missing in a small West Virginian town known for its sweet mountain air.

programme.title: Heartland Homicide
programme.desc: In the small town of Logan, Ohio, Summer Inman is violently abducted in a back alley behind her workplace; with multiple eye-witness accounts, investigators quickly zero in on three suspects who refuse to cooperate.

programme.title: Heartland Homicide
programme.desc: Keith is known as a quiet but highly skilled artisan who takes good care of his mother, but after she becomes mysteriously ill and he is not heard from for three weeks, his girlfriend Betty comes under suspicion.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved Heists
programme.desc: When Quebecs maple syrup reserve is plundered, detectives must track down the culprits before the situation boils over; detectives uncover a conspiracy that threatens to shake the very foundations of the maple syrup industry.

programme.title: Return to Wickensburg
programme.desc: Mr. Hexenmeister has escaped from prison, and once again threatens Wickensburg. A race against time to find an ancient orb, capable of destroying the entire town, before it falls into the wrong hands. Starring Denise Richards, Julian Richings, Steve Byers.

programme.title: The Devils Handshake
programme.desc: A POV feature, examining Nazism through a very different lens; apersonal and unexpected degrees of separation of a filmmaker to Adolf Hitler woven into an unsettling story of otherwise good people caught up on the wrong side. Starring Andrew Wall.

programme.title: Stars Fell Again
programme.desc: Hollywood agent Bryce Dixon is ready to propose to Madison during their Christmastime visit to her family in rural Oregon. programme.sub-title: I Love You, I Love You Not (1997)
programme.desc: A Jewish prep school student (Claire Danes) shares stories of anti-Semitism with her grandmother (Jeanne Moreau), an Auschwitz survivor.

programme.title: Kindred (2025)
programme.desc: A pair of twisted, young criminals decide to break into a mansion for one big score, but they soon find out that the owners of the house are much more dangerous than they are.

programme.title: Cold Mountain (2003)
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a wounded Confederate soldier (Jude Law) abandons his duties to make his way home to his sweetheart (Nicole Kidman).

programme.title: Queen of the Desert (2015)
programme.desc: Gertrude Bells life as an explorer, cartographer, and archaeologist for the British Empire.

programme.title: Kate and Leopold (2001)
programme.desc: A Manhattan woman (Meg Ryan) falls in love with the 19th-century Duke of Albany (Hugh Jackman) who has stepped through a time portal.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love (1998)
programme.desc: Young William Shakespeare (Joseph Fiennes) falls for Viola (Gwyneth Paltrow), reawakening his creativity, but she is betrothed to Wessex.

programme.title: Runaway Bride (1999)
programme.desc: A New York reporter (Richard Gere) travels to Maryland to profile a woman (Julia Roberts) who left three bridegrooms at the altar.

programme.title: Frida (2002)
programme.desc: Mexican painter Frida Kahlo (Salma Hayek) marries fellow artist Diego Rivera who shares her radical political views.

programme.title: Like Water for Chocolate (1992)
programme.desc: The youngest daughter (Lumi Cavazos) of a Mexican family expresses her feelings in preparing wonderful food, when tradition keeps her from marrying her true love (Marco Leonardi).

programme.title: Bounce (2000)
programme.desc: An ad executive (Ben Affleck) seeks out the widow (Gwyneth Paltrow) of a stranger who swapped tickets with him before boarding an ill-fated flight.

programme.title: Jane Eyre (1996)
programme.desc: Charlotte Bront칢s gothic heroine loves her moody employer, who keeps a dark secret hidden from her.

programme.title: Sabrina (1995)
programme.desc: Sons (Harrison Ford, Greg Kinnear) of a Long Island tycoon become romantic rivals for the chauffeurs daughter (Julia Ormond).

programme.title: Jersey Girl (2004)
programme.desc: A young woman (Liv Tyler) changes the life of a single father (Ben Affleck) who used to be a successful New York music publicist.

programme.title: Nobodys Fool (2018)
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danicas picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: The First Wives Club (1996)
programme.desc: Three 50-ish college friends (Goldie Hawn, Bette Midler, Diane Keaton) plot revenge after their husbands dump them for younger women.

programme.title: Company Man (2000)
programme.desc: A CIA agent (Douglas McGrath) recounts his misadventures for two senators, beginning with his wife (Sigourney Weaver) who wanted to write a tell-all about his life.

programme.title: Anything Else (2003)
programme.desc: A writer (Jason Biggs) has problems with his live-in girlfriend (Christina Ricci) and an obsessive teacher (Woody Allen) with a history of mental illness.

programme.title: Jane Eyre (1996)
programme.desc: Charlotte Bront칢s gothic heroine loves her moody employer, who keeps a dark secret hidden from her.

programme.title: Becoming Jane (2007)
programme.desc: Though her parents expect her to marry a wealthy suitor, young Jane Austen (Anne Hathaway) becomes involved with a penniless lawyer (James McAvoy) who inspires her future writings.

programme.title: Match Point (2005)
programme.desc: A one-time tennis professional (Jonathan Rhys-Meyers) becomes obsessed with his brother-in-laws (Matthew Goode) seductive fiancee (Scarlett Johansson).

programme.title: The To Do List (2013)
programme.desc: Determined to shed her uptight image, a high-school valedictorian (Aubrey Plaza) decides to lose her virginity before college begins. Realizing that she is out of her depth, she asks friends and family for advice.

programme.title: Alfie (2004)
programme.desc: A Londoner (Jude Law) continues his womanizing ways while working as a chauffeur in New York.

programme.title: Nobodys Fool (2018)
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danicas picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Marvelous and the Black Hole (2021)
programme.desc: A rebellious 13-year-old who is dealing with the loss of her mother embarks on an adventure with a childrens party magician.

programme.title: Blue Eyed Girl (2025)
programme.desc: Summoned home to visit her two sisters and her ailing father, a woman starts to re-evaluate her life as she wonders what could have been.

programme.title: The Silent Planet (2024)
programme.desc: Serving a life sentence alone on a distant planet, an aging convict must confront his past when a new prisoner arrives and forces him to remember his life on Earth.

programme.title: Seaside (2018)
programme.desc: A woman decides to run away to the Oregon coast with her boyfriend when he inherits a family beach house.

programme.title: About Adam (2000)
programme.desc: A magnetic young man (Stuart Townsend) meets and romances an Irish waitress (Kate Hudson), then courts and beds the rest of the family.

programme.title: Shes Out of My League (2010)
programme.desc: An airport security agent must figure out how to make the relationship work when a beautiful, successful woman falls in love with him.

programme.title: Jennys Wedding (2015)
programme.desc: When Jenny (Katherine Heigl) decides to marry a woman (Alexis Bledel), her conventional family must accept who she is or risk losing her forever.

programme.title: Inside Angling
programme.desc: Inside Angling go to Kilombero North Safaris to target the incredible blue tigers that are found in that remote wilderness. The sheer numbers and quality of the fish in that area need to be seen to be believed.

programme.title: Wild Fly
programme.desc: The Great Orange of South Africa ranks as the largest river that flows through this country and is responsible for Rhuans infatuation with its indigenous species. It has made so many unforgettable fishing memories.

programme.title: Wild Fish Wild Places
programme.desc: Denis and longtime friend Lewis head deep into Canadas north to chase trophy lake trout at legendary Lake Athabasca. These fish are beasts - heavy, powerful, and aggressive - and they put the gear and the anglers to the test.

programme.desc: Joe and Dan go spearfishing with a world champion capable of spearfishing to extreme depths over 200ft. The crew visit a local fish restaurant and Joe catches a Mediterranean snapper and brings to back to Mike in England to cook.
